roleset.name: entrance
roleset.note: BEWITCH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'bewitch' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 31.1. (from bewitch.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: adjectival
example.text: That list includes last season's champs, the Los Angeles Dodgers, who rode a miracle home run by Kirk Gibson and two faultless pitching performances by Orel Hershiser to a five-game triumph over a bewitched, bothered Oakland crew.

example.name: ARG1
example.text: That list includes last season 's champs , the Los Angeles Dodgers , who rode a miracle home run by Kirk Gibson and two faultless pitching performances by Orel Hershiser to a five - game triumph over a bewitched , bothered Oakland crew .
